tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I cleaned my teeth and got me a ceramic cap fixed on my root canal tooth. Experience was great.Doctor really explains all the steps involved in the procedure and it makes you feel confident and comfortable about what she is about to do.And all the procedures were done **** **********,no pain ,no unnecessary cuts or anything ,very smooth.I never had to wait during my appointments.Its been more than three more that i made a cap and got it fixed,in the beginning it might feel a bit loose but the tooth grows into it and now it feels as good as original tooth.Thank you.
reply_text: Thank you so much Mr.Rohit for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Most my family members started going to Dr. Ami after I introduced them to her. And I have heard zero complains and only praises. She is polite and patient. She will make sure that you understand what the problem is and what treatment is required. 
She will never recommend you to go for procedures which are not required. She doesn‚Äôt add on unnecessary treatments. Her only priorities are heathly teeth and that her patients don‚Äôt suffer.
I have been going to her over 6 months now and I take my grandmother to her too. 
Trustworthy doctor.
reply_text: Thanks alot Jaziba for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had visited Dr. Ami for a dental clean up and a cavity filling. She explained to me the entire treatment plan before getting started. She also made sure I was always at ease and dealt with me very patiently. I hardly experienced any pain in the process and was very comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Doctor Ami  is very professional and good at her work. She is polite and soft spoken. I am very happy that I was advised to see her. She is  very good in explaining the problem and also clearly explains how it can be taken care of. I'm very much satisfied and would highly recommend her to people I know. Her etiquette is highly commendable
reply_text: Thanks alot Leonce for your valuable and kind feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: In the process of my RCT and must say I have not seen such an experienced pair of hands in a long time. Not only will she explain you every process but will also make the entire process very less painful. I still have a few more sittings left so I could say that I am in very able hands for the moment. Definitely recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ami Sukhija welcomed me with a warm smile & immediately measured my O2 Sat level, pulse rate & temp. I was administered an antiseptic mouth gargle. She then took a X- Ray  of my broken molar & advised rinsing with Plax for 3 to 4 days. I was fixed for an appt on 18th Oct. All in all I am very happy with her treatment & advise. I would definitely recommend her to my friends & relatives.
reply_text: Thanks alot Mr Shenoy for your kind review

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She is an amazing person and discusses the problem in detail. She is honest with her professional work and gives right solution. 

On personal front, she is definitely a good human being as well and l am sure she will do wonders one day. 

She prescribed medicines to me which is helped me to overcome toothache  and gave me confidence in going ahead with surgical tooth extraction.

review:
Dr. Ami explained my children about cavilties and the importance of brushing at night. She was very calm and patient during my son's treatment (cavity filling), before starting the treatment she explained my son which tools are going to be used and why? She kept talking to my son during the treatment for his mind diversion.

Keep up the good work you do. God Bless You always üôèüòá

Her approach towards handling every patient patiently is commendable.

All the best Dr. Ami for your future.
